values: To intrigue means to cause an interest in something or someone.
Her mysterious past intrigued her new friend.

- vi. 搞阴谋诡计
- vt. 激起…的好奇心
- n. 密谋策划, 阴谋
- 阴谋, 诡计

时 态:  
intrigued, intriguing, intrigues  

名 词:
